name: Zombie City X Prototype
description:
Hi what this game here is something I have been working on for a while now as a final major project for college, I'm a first year and would like people to test out this prototype and gain feedback. This is a action zombie like game where you go around shooting zombies and try to get the highest score possible. Some things still need to be added for example zombie models and a scoreboard however. I feel as its the best course of action to get views from other people first to change certain stuff or add new elements.

Thanks in advance if you do test this out. :)
